  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>SDT</catalog>
            <entry>27e45df2-6ded-4b21-b127-d5a23b0f0bb8#1#7</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="hu">A közép-európai országok és népek története</string>
            <string language="en">The history of the countries and folks in the Middle-Europe</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Die Geschichte der Länder und der Völker im 
Mittler-Europa</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">L'histoire des pays et des gens en Moyen-Europe</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O history dos países e dos povos na 
Médio-Europa</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">La storia dei paesi e della gente in 
Centrale-Europa</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Η ιστορία των χωρών και των λαών σε στα μέσα 
τουΕυρώπη</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">La historia de los países y de la gente en la 
Medio-Europa</string>
          </title>
          <language>hu</language>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">Az országok rövid története</string>
            <string language="en">The short history of the countries</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu">kisállamok,  nacionalizmus,  klíring-elszámolás,  gazdasági függés,  </string>
            <string language="en">small states, nationalism, kliring settlemetn of accounts, economic dependence</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Die kurze Geschichte der Länder</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">L'histoire courte des pays</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O history curto dos países</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">La storia corta dei paesi</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Η σύντομη ιστορία των χωρών</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">La historia corta de los países</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">kleine Zustände, Nationalismus, kliring settlemetn 
Rechnungsprüfungen, ökonomische Abhängigkeit</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">petits états, nationalisme, settlemetn kliring des 
comptes, la dépendance économique</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">estados pequenos, nationalism, settlemetn kliring dos 
clientes, dependência econômica</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">piccolo dichiara, nazionalismo, kliring il 
settlemetn dei clienti, dipendenza economica</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">μικρά κράτη, εθνικισμός, poy settlemetn των 
απολογισμών, οικονομική εξάρτηση</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">estados pequeños, nacionalismo, settlemetn kliring de 
cuentas, dependencia económica</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <educational>

          <description>
            <string language="hu">A tartalom kizárólag kizárólag az oktatás illetve tudományos kutatás céljára használható szigorúan non-profit jelleggel.</string>
            <string language="en">The content may be used for the sole purpose of illustration for teaching or scientific research and only for a strictly non-commercial purpose.</string>
          </description>
        </rights>

org:BCSS Kft.
end:vcard</entity>

        </lifeCycle>

      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
